00046 #include <stdio.h>
00047 #include <math.h>
00048 #include <stdarg.h>
00049 #include "midas.h"

00051 /*---- globals -----------------------------------------------------*/
00052 
00053 typedef struct {
00054    int address;
00055    int polarity[16];
00056 } LRS1440_SETTINGS;
00057 
00058 #define LRS1440_SETTINGS_STR "\
00059 Address = INT : 1\n\
00060 Polarity = INT[16] :\n\
00061 [0] -1\n\
00062 [1] -1\n\
00063 [2] -1\n\
00064 [3] -1\n\
00065 [4] -1\n\
00066 [5] -1\n\
00067 [6] -1\n\
00068 [7] -1\n\
00069 [8] -1\n\
00070 [9] -1\n\
00071 [10] -1\n\
00072 [11] -1\n\
00073 [12] -1\n\
00074 [13] -1\n\
00075 [14] -1\n\
00076 "
00077 
00078 typedef struct {
00079    LRS1440_SETTINGS settings;
00080    int num_channels;
00081     INT(*bd) (INT cmd, ...);    /* bus driver entry function */
00082    void *bd_info;               /* private info of bus driver */
00083 } LRS1440_INFO;
00084 
00085 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00086 
00087 void lrs1440_switch(LRS1440_INFO * info)
00088 {
00089    static INT last_address = -1;
00090    char str[80];
00091    INT status;
00092 
00093    if (info->settings.address != last_address) {
00094       BD_PUTS("M16\r\n");
00095       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "M16\r\n", 1000);
00096       sprintf(str, "M%02d\r\n", info->settings.address);
00097       BD_PUTS(str);
00098       status = BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "responding\r\n", 2000);
00099       if (!status) {
00100          cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1440_init",
00101                 "LRS1440 adr %d doesn't respond. Check power and RS232 connection.",
00102                 info->settings.address);
00103          return;
00104       }
00105 
00106       last_address = info->settings.address;
00107    }
00108 }
00109 
00110 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 
00112 INT lrs1440_init(HNDLE hkey, void **pinfo, INT channels, INT(*bd) (INT cmd, ...))
00113 {
00114    int status, size;
00115    char str[256];
00116    HNDLE hDB, hkeydd;
00117    LRS1440_INFO *info;
00118 
00119    /* allocate info structure */
00120    info = calloc(1, sizeof(LRS1440_INFO));
00121    *pinfo = info;
00122 
00123    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00124 
00125    /* create LRS1440 settings record */
00126    status = db_create_record(hDB, hkey, "DD", LRS1440_SETTINGS_STR);
00127    if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
00128       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00129 
00130    db_find_key(hDB, hkey, "DD", &hkeydd);
00131    size = sizeof(info->settings);
00132    db_get_record(hDB, hkeydd, &info->settings, &size, 0);
00133 
00134    info->num_channels = channels;
00135    info->bd = bd;
00136 
00137    /* initialize bus driver */
00138    if (!bd)
00139       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00140 
00141    status = bd(CMD_INIT, hkey, &info->bd_info);
00142 
00143    if (status != SUCCESS)
00144       return status;
00145 
00146    bd(CMD_DEBUG, FALSE);
00147 
00148    /* check if module is living  */
00149    BD_PUTS("M16\r\n");
00150    status = BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "M16\r\n", 2000);
00151    if (!status) {
00152       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1440_init",
00153              "LRS1440 adr %d doesn't respond. Check power and RS232 connection.",
00154              info->settings.address);
00155       return FE_ERR_HW;
00156    }
00157 
00158    sprintf(str, "M%02d\r\n", info->settings.address);
00159    BD_PUTS(str);
00160    status = BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "responding\r\n", 3000);
00161    if (!status) {
00162       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1440_init",
00163              "LRS1440 adr %d doesn't respond. Check power and RS232 connection.",
00164              info->settings.address);
00165       return FE_ERR_HW;
00166    }
00167 
00168    /* check if HV enabled */
00169    BD_PUTS("ST\r");
00170    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "abled", 3000);
00171 
00172    if (str[strlen(str) - 6] == 's') {
00173       /* read rest of status */
00174       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "", 0);
00175 
00176       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1440_init",
00177              "LeCroy1440 adr %d: HV disabled by front panel button",
00178              info->settings.address);
00179 //    return FE_ERR_HW;
00180    }
00181 
00182    /* read rest of status */
00183    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "", 0);
00184 
00185    /* turn on HV main switch */
00186    BD_PUTS("ON\r");
00187    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "Turn on\r\n", 5000);
00188 
00189    BD_PUTS("M16\r\n");
00190 
00191    return FE_SUCCESS;
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00195 
00196 INT lrs1440_exit(LRS1440_INFO * info)
00197 {
00198    info->bd(CMD_EXIT, info->bd_info);
00199 
00200    free(info);
00201 
00202    return FE_SUCCESS;
00203 }
00204 
00205 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00206 
00207 INT lrs1440_set(LRS1440_INFO * info, INT channel, float value)
00208 {
00209    char str[80];
00210 
00211    lrs1440_switch(info);
00212 
00213    sprintf(str, "W%04.0f C%02d\r", info->settings.polarity[channel / 16] * value,
00214            channel);
00215 
00216    BD_PUTS(str);
00217    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n\r\n", 1000);
00218 
00219    return FE_SUCCESS;
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00223 
00224 INT lrs1440_set_all(LRS1440_INFO * info, INT channels, float value)
00225 {
00226    char str[80];
00227    INT i;
00228 
00229    lrs1440_switch(info);
00230 
00231    for (i = 0; i < (channels - 1) / 16 + 1; i++) {
00232       sprintf(str, "W%04.0f C%d DO16\r", info->settings.polarity[i / 16] * value, i * 16);
00233       BD_PUTS(str);
00234       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n\r\n", 3000);
00235    }
00236 
00237    return FE_SUCCESS;
00238 }
00239 
00240 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00241 
00242 INT lrs1440_get(LRS1440_INFO * info, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00243 {
00244    int value;
00245    char str[256];
00246 
00247    lrs1440_switch(info);
00248 
00249    sprintf(str, "R V C%02d\r", channel);
00250    BD_PUTS(str);
00251    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "Act ", 1000);
00252    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n\r\n", 1000);
00253    sscanf(str + 1, "%d", &value);
00254 
00255    *pvalue = (float) value;
00256 
00257    return FE_SUCCESS;
00258 }
00259 
00260 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00261 
00262 INT lrs1440_get_all(LRS1440_INFO * info, INT channels, float *array)
00263 {
00264    int value, i, j;
00265    char str[256];
00266 
00267    lrs1440_switch(info);
00268 
00269    sprintf(str, "R V F C0 DO%d\r", channels);
00270    BD_PUTS(str);
00271 
00272    for (i = 0; i <= (channels - 1) / 8; i++) {
00273       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "Act ", 5000);
00274       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n", 2000);
00275       for (j = 0; j < 8 && i * 8 + j < channels; j++) {
00276          sscanf(str + 1 + j * 6, "%d", &value);
00277          array[i * 8 + j] = (float) value;
00278       }
00279    }
00280    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n", 2000);
00281 
00282    return FE_SUCCESS;
00283 }
00284 
00285 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00286 
00287 INT lrs1440_set_current_limit(LRS1440_INFO * info, float limit)
00288 {
00289    char str[256];
00290 
00291    lrs1440_switch(info);
00292 
00293    if (limit > 255)
00294       limit = 255.f;
00295 
00296    sprintf(str, "LI %1.0f\r", limit);
00297    BD_PUTS(str);
00298    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n\r\n", 1000);
00299 
00300    sprintf(str, "LI %1.0f\r", -limit);
00301    BD_PUTS(str);
00302    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n\r\n", 1000);
00303 
00304    return FE_SUCCESS;
00305 }
00306 
00307 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00308 
00309 INT lrs1440(INT cmd, ...)
00310 {
00311    va_list argptr;
00312    HNDLE hKey;
00313    INT channel, status;
00314    float value, *pvalue;
00315    void *info, *bd;
00316    DWORD flags;
00317 
00318    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00319    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00320 
00321    switch (cmd) {
00322    case CMD_INIT:
00323       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00324       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00325       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00326       flags = va_arg(argptr, DWORD);
00327       bd = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00328       status = lrs1440_init(hKey, info, channel, bd);
00329       break;
00330 
00331    case CMD_EXIT:
00332       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00333       status = lrs1440_exit(info);
00334       break;
00335 
00336    case CMD_SET:
00337       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00338       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00339       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00340       status = lrs1440_set(info, channel, value);
00341       break;
00342 
00343    case CMD_SET_ALL:
00344       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00345       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00346       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00347       status = lrs1440_set_all(info, channel, value);
00348       break;
00349 
00350    case CMD_GET:
00351       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00352       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00353       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00354       status = lrs1440_get(info, channel, pvalue);
00355       break;
00356 
00357    case CMD_GET_ALL:
00358       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00359       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00360       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00361       status = lrs1440_get_all(info, channel, pvalue);
00362       break;
00363 
00364       /* current measurements not supported in LRS1440 */
00365 
00366    case CMD_GET_CURRENT:
00367       break;
00368 
00369    case CMD_GET_CURRENT_ALL:
00370       break;
00371 
00372    case CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT:
00373       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00374       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00375       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00376       if (channel == 0)         /* one one limit for all channels */
00377          status = lrs1440_set_current_limit(info, value);
00378       else
00379          status = FE_SUCCESS;
00380       break;
00381 
00382    default:
00383       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1440 device driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00384       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00385       break;
00386    }
00387 
00388    va_end(argptr);
00389 
00390    return status;
00391 }
